pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semiparametric Accelerated Failure Time Model // Implements several basic algorithms for estimating regression parameters for semiparametric accelerated failure time (AFT) model. The main methods are: Jin rank-based method (Jin (2003) doi:10.1093/biomet/90.2.341), Hellers estimating method (Heller (2012) doi:10.1198/016214506000001257), Polynomial smoothed Gehan function method (Chung (2013) doi:10.1007/s11222-012-9333-9), Buckley-James method (Buckley (1979) doi:10.2307/2335161) and Jin`s improved least squares method (Jin (2006) doi:10.1093/biomet/93.1.147). This package can be used for modeling right-censored data and for comparing different estimation algorithms.
